alert.note: Alert for Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 2:56PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Showers and thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern St. Johns and south central Duval Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 255 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers and a thunderstorm over Mandarin and over northwest St Johns county. This activity was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall with rainfall amounts up to 2.5 inches already. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Fruit Cove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval
